name: Data Backup Plan
description: Procedures for backing up and storing ePHI to ensure availability in case of system failure or disaster
components: Backup schedule, storage location, backup media, retention policy, restoration procedures

name: Disaster Recovery Plan
description: Comprehensive plan to restore systems and data following a major incident or catastrophic failure
components: Recovery objectives, recovery procedures, communication plan, alternative processing sites, equipment procurement

name: Emergency Mode Operation Plan
description: Procedures for continuing operations during system outages or disasters to maintain PHI availability
components: Emergency procedures, manual operations, reduced functionality operations, critical system prioritization

name: Testing and Revision Procedures
description: Regular testing and documentation of contingency planning effectiveness and updates
components: Test documentation, incident reports, plan updates, lessons learned, improvement tracking

name: Applications and Data Criticality Analysis
description: Assessment to identify critical ePHI systems and prioritize recovery efforts
components: System inventory, criticality ratings, recovery time objectives, recovery point objectives, dependency mapping

name: System Redundancy and Failover
description: Implementation of redundant systems and automatic failover mechanisms to ensure continuous availability
components: Primary system configuration, secondary system setup, failover triggers, automated switching, monitoring

name: Off-site Data Storage
description: Secure storage of backup data at geographically separated locations to protect against localized disasters
components: Storage facility selection, data transportation, environmental controls, access restrictions, retrieval procedures

name: Communication and Notification Plan
description: Procedures for notifying workforce and external parties of system failures and recovery status
components: Contact lists, notification templates, escalation procedures, status update frequency, stakeholder identification

name: Business Associate Continuity Requirements
description: Ensures business associates have contingency planning aligned with covered entity requirements
components: Business associate agreements, contingency requirements documentation, compliance verification, regular audits

name: Recovery Priority Determination
description: Process for determining which systems and functions are restored first based on criticality
components: Prioritization matrix, recovery sequence, resource allocation, decision-making authority, documentation

name: Contingency Planning Documentation
description: Comprehensive written documentation of all contingency planning policies and procedures
components: Policy manual, procedure documents, decision trees, reference materials, contact information

name: Contingency Planning Training
description: Training program ensuring workforce understands contingency planning procedures and their roles
components: Training curriculum, role-specific training, refresher training, training records, competency assessment

name: Alternate Processing Sites
description: Identification and arrangement of alternative facilities for processing ePHI during outages
components: Site agreement, geographic separation, system compatibility, access procedures, maintenance agreements

name: Testing Procedures
description: Detailed procedures for conducting contingency plan tests and exercises
components: Test types, test schedule, test documentation, success criteria, reporting requirements, participant list

name: Plan Maintenance and Updates
description: Process for regular review and updating of contingency planning based on organizational changes
components: Review schedule, change log, approval process, distribution procedure, version control, archive management

name: Critical System Identification
description: Inventory and identification of systems and data that are essential to business operations
components: System documentation, criticality assessment, dependencies, recovery time objectives, business impact analysis

name: Data Restoration Procedures
description: Specific procedures for restoring ePHI from backups to operational systems
components: Restoration steps, verification procedures, integrity checking, audit trails, documentation requirements

name: Contingency Planning for Workforce
description: Procedures ensuring workforce can perform critical functions during system outages
components: Alternative work locations, manual processes, communication methods, equipment provisioning, training

name: Supplier and Vendor Contingency Arrangements
description: Coordination with third-party suppliers for continued service delivery during disasters
components: Vendor agreements, backup services, communication protocols, service level agreements, contact procedures

name: Post-disaster Recovery Assessment
description: Process for evaluating recovery efforts and identifying improvements
components: Assessment criteria, documentation, lessons learned review, corrective actions, timeline for implementation
